archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0853
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want a robust inventory system to record our hardware and for this system to have visibility of access to all staff by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services or staff who may be administering the services.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
